trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.

Based on the scope of defined by <c>printTicketLevel</c>, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs" /> class.
Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: As configurações de impressora padrão a ser usado quando o documento é impresso.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> propriedade não validar ou modificar especificado <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, use o método <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> específico <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que é válido para uma determinada impressora.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> event.

An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração que indica o escopo do <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> evento para uma sequência de documentos, um único documento ou uma única página.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> é de propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> propriedade especifica o número de documentos de saída com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para outros <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> valores, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> propriedade especifica o número de páginas de saída com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
The number of documents or pages output with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de documentos ou páginas de saída com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> é de propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> propriedade especifica o número de documentos de saída com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para outros <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> valores, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> propriedade especifica o número de páginas de saída com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
